description: This file defines classes, agents, and a team for stock and company analysis using OpenAI models and financial tools, and demonstrates running queries and printing responses.

classes.name: StockAnalysis
classes.description: Data model for stock analysis results, including symbol, company name, and analysis.

classes.name: CompanyAnalysis
classes.description: Data model for company analysis results, including company name and analysis.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes a query on the team to retrieve stock or company information.
